about_p1: After 15 years as a show operator technician (stage machinery system control) on various software, I turned to my first passion which is web development.
about_p2: It was in March 2022 that I decided to follow the Le Reacteur bootcamp, full stack web developer MERN, which will complete my years of self-taught training. Following this, I did a 5-month internship at Cercle de Voyages, in Paris.
about_p3: I would like to join your team as a junior web developer or as an intern with the opportunity to be hired at the end of the contract.
contact_p1: Do not hesitate to contact me, I am at your disposal for more information
main_t3: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, React Native, Express.js, MongoDB
title: Hello
todo_descriptions: Cross platform Todo app (web, mobile, Desktop) with local database, made with Vue 3, Quasar, Capacitor, Electron, Tauri, Localbase.
